<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The all-ones vector constant can be materialized using a pcmpeq</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction that is commonly recognized as an idiom (has no register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dependency), so that&#39;s better/smaller than loading a splat 1 constant.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// But don&#39;t do this if it would inhibit a potentially profitable load</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="993"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// folding opportunity for the other operand. That only occurs with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// intersection of:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (1) The other operand (op0) is load foldable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (2) The op is an add (otherwise, we are &#42;creating&#42; an add and can still</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     load fold the other op).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (3) The target has AVX (otherwise, we have a destructive add and can&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     load fold the other op without killing the constant op).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (4) The constant 1 vector has multiple uses (so it is profitable to load</span></CodeLine>
